data.name: Love, Ghostie
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist now!


About the Game

Love, Ghostie is a cozy and relaxing game with tons of wholesome romance! As a cute ghost in a mansion, it's your job to set up residents and help them find love!

What romances will you create?

Features

♥ Create any romance you want - every resident is shippable with every other resident!

♥ Learn about each resident - read through their diary and give them gifts to discover what they love most!



♥ Bring joy into a stranger’s life - set residents up on (not-so) secret dates and give them tasks that affect their happiness!

♥ Watch their love bloom - as residents get closer to each other, you’ll unlock adorable relationship scenes. Every pair of residents has their own unique story!



♥ Large combination of couples - at least 10+ residents, discover over 45+ combinations of couples with unique storylines!

data.short_description: Be a wholesome ghost matchmaker and grow relationships between the mansion's residents! Gift items to brighten their lives, set them up on dates, and watch their love bloom! What romances will you create?

  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or later, 64-bit
